name: NASU Plus
description:
(NOTE: Browser version of game extremely experimental - please tell me your experiences with it. The sound on the download versions is fine.)

This is a shmup Yume Nikki fangame using the character from Yume Nikki's NASU minigame. I started working on this because I wanted to make a Yume Nikki fangame, but I'm honestly no good at making the traditional sort of stuff. So I decided to make something different, while trying to learn how to use Game Maker.

9/24/16: Version 0.01 released, with two stages

11/26/16: Version 0.02 released, with three stages and introducing power-ups

12/30/16: Version 0.03 released, introducing looping.
